text: har jaan ek na ek (din) maut ka maza chakhegee aur tum log qayaamat ke din (apane kie ka) poora poora badala bhar paoge pas jo shakhs jahannum se hata diya gaya aur bahisht mein pahuncha diya gaya pas vahee kaamayaab hua aur duniya kee (chand roza) zindagee dhokhe kee tattee ke siva kuchh nahin
